entry.title: From unstructured news to real-time visualizations, a Fintech story
entry.summary:
Description

In Fintech selecting the right technologies is as important as having the best ideas.

In this talk we will present how Ravenpack, one of the most important Big Data analytics providers for financial services, transforms unstructured documents into real-time visualizations. More precisely, we will focus on how we use Python to support the process.
